definition: to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。
她能不能不要再跌落了？

sentences.english: Her ranking could fall far, and quickly.
sentences.chinese: 她的排名就要跌落，而且很快。

sentences.english: The whole world was full of things rolling, slithering and falling.
sentences.chinese: 整个世界充满了转动，滑行和跌落。

sentences.english: She fell off a long footbridge near the teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 她在茶馆附近，自一座很长的人行桥上跌落下去。

sentences.english: The languages of Denmark and Norway both have similar words. The words mean to fall suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦和挪威语中都有类似的单词，意思是急速跌落。

sentences.english: He was hipped when he dropped from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他从树上跌落了下来，把髋关节摔脱了臼。

sentences.english: If you drop something on the trackway , do not attempt to retrieve it!
sentences.chinese: 若您的物品跌落轨道，切勿自行取回。

sentences.english: Pictorially, it is like a falling off the edge of a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 以图画的形式来显示，这就像一个跌落悬崖的过程。

sentences.english: The characteristics of major shock and secondary shocks in drop-test are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了在跌落冲击试验时主冲击与次冲击的特点。

sentences.english: Non synergy leads to fall after fall towards extinction thought-form.
sentences.chinese: 非协同，带来了一次又一次走向绝灭思想形态的跌落。

sentences.english: You should leam proper falling techniques.
sentences.chinese: 你应该学习正确的跌落方式。

sentences.english: Nigerians have long danced on the edge of the cliff without falling off.
sentences.chinese: 长久以来，尼日利亚在悬崖边上跳舞都未曾跌落。

sentences.english: I managed to grab hold of the jug before it fell.
sentences.chinese: 我设法抓住了那个罐子才未跌落。

sentences.english: Forget my daredevil sister practically dangling off the Cliffs of Moher.
sentences.chinese: 忘却了我那个冒失鬼妹妹几乎从莫赫山的峭壁跌落。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the mountains just stopped, dropping into a void fringed with black sand and surf.
sentences.chinese: 有时，山脉中断了，跌落进黑沙和海浪镶边的空地。

definition: to fall into/to dip below a certain level
to tumble/to fall/fig. to suffer a reverse (in politics or business)
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
